content: the shanti hat is a free crochet beanie that s sized for the whole family this quick and easy hat pattern is one you ll go back to over and over it s a great hat that fits well and comes in four sizes sizes preemie baby medium large measurements 12 14 18 22 yarn ewe ewe yarns wooly worsted 2 95 yards preemie 1 skein baby 1 skein medium 2 skeins large 2 skeins sapphire shown crochet hook size k/10 5 6 5 mm supplies darning needle gauge 14 double_crochet over 4 ------------------------------------- find the ewe ewe yarn to make this project local stockists and sign up for our newsletter at www eweewe com 3 1 http //www eweewe com/blog/2014/5/12/charity-hat-along-lets-make-hats 2 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/ewe-ewe-yarns-wooly-worsted 3 http //www eweewe com
